alchemy.title: Alchemy
alchemy.description:
Alchemists is an ancient practise used to brew magical potions. In order to brew potions you use a mortar and pestle, reagents and empty bottles, which can be poured into potion kegs for storing large amount of liquids. Potion kegs can be crafted using Carpentry and Tinkering. 

Alchemy is required to turn raw reagents into ready-to-use reagents. Every 10% skillpoint in Alchemy rewards you with one extra reagent from a raw reagent. Example: if you have 50% Alchemy you will transform one raw reagent into 5 reagents.

Craftables

ImgPotion TypeRequired SkillRequired ReagentsMagical EffectTime of effect or delay
 Lesser Heal1%1 GinsengHeals 10 - 19 HP15 seconds delay
